full_summary:
**Electrochemical Measurement Station Tender Announcement**

**Contract Details**

* Reference Number: WS4381133340-Doc4395177819
* Solicitation Number: WS4381133340
* Publication Date: 2024-01-17
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-02-02T14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-03-13
* Expected Contract End Date: One year after delivery and acceptance

**Project Overview**

The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) invites qualified contractors to submit a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply of an electrochemical measurement station. The required equipment includes a new potentiostat and galvanostat with a frequency response analyzer. The purchase of an additional station is also an option.

**Key Requirements**

* Mandatory requirements detailed in the RFP
* Delivery to Ottawa, ON within six weeks after contract award date
* Period of contract: from contract award date to one year after delivery and acceptance

**Evaluation Criteria**

Bids will be evaluated using the lowest price as the primary criterion.

**Bid Submission and Debriefing**

* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2024-02-02 at 14:00 EST
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the RFP process
* Requests must be made within 15 working days of receipt of RFP results
* Debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person

**Contracting Entity and End-User**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

**Contact Information**

* Vanessa Burns, Contracting Authority
* vanessa.burns@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice and Attachments**

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18543039?extsite=MTg1NDMwMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
